title: Bag
body:
Why are you not at your place?
The housekeepers will be here at any moment
[[Dude, we need to get out of here!|Bag1]]
[[Let's run away! People are abandoning plastic ALL TOGETHER!|Bag2]]

title: Bag1
body:
Why?
[[Ecologists are urging people to reduce the use of plastic and switch to reusable items|Bag11]]

title: Bag11
body:
I think it's YOUR problem buddy
I AM REUSABLE ITEM !!
[[And you think how many times they will use you, no one is everlasting!|Bag111]]
[[Do really want to be just a bag till the end of your life?|B112]]

title: Bag111
body:
And where will you go?
[[Wherever, in the World behind the DOOR there will be a safe place for us!|Bag1111]]

title: Bag1111
body:
But first we need to deal with the stairs.
We can try fly!
<<add DialoguePopup Bag>>
Grap onto me little console!
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>

title: B112
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 1>>
And who else should I be?
[[Whoever you want! I think behind the door you will be appreciate|Bag112a]]

title: Bag112a
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 0>>
Well..
I don't have really nothing to lose.
But how should we deal with stairs?
[[If we properly inflate you I think we could fly away!|Bag112b]]

title: Bag112b
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 1>>
<<add DialoguePopup Bag>>
Seems I have got nothing to lose!
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>

title: Bag2
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 1>>
Should I feel threatend?
[[Maybe not yet, but sooner or later...|Bag21]]
[[Who knows...|Bags]]

title: Bag21
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 0>>
<<add DialoguePopup Bag>>
T-Then I will go with you!
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>

title: Bags
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 0>>
Well, it's better to run away than risk and stay here.
<<add DialoguePopup Bag>>
I will help you fly downstairs!
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>
